tab_infos.Name: tracks
tab_infos.Description: list of track

tab_infos.Name: id
tab_infos.Description: The track's Deezer id

tab_infos.Name: title
tab_infos.Description: The track's fulltitle

tab_infos.Name: title_short
tab_infos.Description: The track's short title

tab_infos.Name: title_version
tab_infos.Description: The track version

tab_infos.Name: link
tab_infos.Description: The url of the track on Deezer

tab_infos.Name: duration
tab_infos.Description: The track's duration in seconds

tab_infos.Name: rank
tab_infos.Description: The track's Deezer rank

tab_infos.Name: explicit_lyrics
tab_infos.Description: Whether the track contains explicit lyrics

tab_infos.Name: preview
tab_infos.Description: The url of track's preview file. This file contains the first 30 seconds of the track

tab_infos.Name: position
tab_infos.Description: The position of the track in the charts

tab_infos.Name: artist
tab_infos.Description: artist object containing : id, name, link, picture, picture_small, picture_medium, picture_big, picture_xl, radio

tab_infos.Name: album
tab_infos.Description: album object containing : id, title, cover, cover_small, cover_medium, cover_big, cover_xl

tab_infos.Name: albums
tab_infos.Description: list of album

tab_infos.Name: id
tab_infos.Description: The Deezer album id

tab_infos.Name: title
tab_infos.Description: The album title

tab_infos.Name: link
tab_infos.Description: The url of the album on Deezer

tab_infos.Name: cover
tab_infos.Description: The url of the album's cover. Add 'size' parameter to the url to change size. Can be 'small', 'medium', 'big', 'xl'

tab_infos.Name: cover_small
tab_infos.Description: The url of the album's cover in size small.

tab_infos.Name: cover_medium
tab_infos.Description: The url of the album's cover in size medium.

tab_infos.Name: cover_big
tab_infos.Description: The url of the album's cover in size big.

tab_infos.Name: cover_xl
tab_infos.Description: The url of the album's cover in size xl.

tab_infos.Name: record_type
tab_infos.Description: The record type of the album (EP / ALBUM / etc..)

tab_infos.Name: explicit_lyrics
tab_infos.Description: Whether the album contains explicit lyrics

tab_infos.Name: position
tab_infos.Description: The position of the album in the charts

tab_infos.Name: artist
tab_infos.Description: artist object containing : id, name, link, picture, picture_small, picture_medium, picture_big, picture_xl, radio

tab_infos.Name: artists
tab_infos.Description: list of artist

tab_infos.Name: id
tab_infos.Description: The artist's Deezer id

tab_infos.Name: name
tab_infos.Description: The artist's name

tab_infos.Name: link
tab_infos.Description: The url of the artist on Deezer

tab_infos.Name: picture
tab_infos.Description: The url of the artist picture. Add 'size' parameter to the url to change size. Can be 'small', 'medium', 'big', 'xl'

tab_infos.Name: picture_small
tab_infos.Description: The url of the artist picture in size small.

tab_infos.Name: picture_medium
tab_infos.Description: The url of the artist picture in size medium.

tab_infos.Name: picture_big
tab_infos.Description: The url of the artist picture in size big.

tab_infos.Name: picture_xl
tab_infos.Description: The url of the artist picture in size xl.

tab_infos.Name: radio
tab_infos.Description: true if the artist has a smartradio

tab_infos.Name: position
tab_infos.Description: The position of the artist in the charts

tab_infos.Name: playlists
tab_infos.Description: list of playlist

tab_infos.Name: id
tab_infos.Description: The playlist's Deezer id

tab_infos.Name: title
tab_infos.Description: The playlist's title

tab_infos.Name: public
tab_infos.Description: If the playlist is public or not

tab_infos.Name: link
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist on Deezer

tab_infos.Name: picture
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist's cover. Add 'size' parameter to the url to change size. Can be 'small', 'medium', 'big', 'xl'

tab_infos.Name: picture_small
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist's cover in size small.

tab_infos.Name: picture_medium
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist's cover in size medium.

tab_infos.Name: picture_big
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist's cover in size big.

tab_infos.Name: picture_xl
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist's cover in size xl.

tab_infos.Name: position
tab_infos.Description: The position of the playlist in the charts

tab_infos.Name: user
tab_infos.Description: user object containing : id, name

tab_infos.Name: podcasts
tab_infos.Description: list of podcast

tab_infos.Name: id
tab_infos.Description: The podcast's Deezer id

tab_infos.Name: title
tab_infos.Description: The podcast's title

tab_infos.Name: description
tab_infos.Description: The podcast's description

tab_infos.Name: available
tab_infos.Description: If the podcast is available or not

tab_infos.Name: fans
tab_infos.Description: The number of podcast's fans

tab_infos.Name: link
tab_infos.Description: The url of the podcast on Deezer

tab_infos.Name: share
tab_infos.Description: The share link of the podcast on Deezer

tab_infos.Name: picture
tab_infos.Description: The url of the podcast's cover.

tab_infos.Name: picture_small
tab_infos.Description: The url of the podcast's cover in size small.

tab_infos.Name: picture_medium
tab_infos.Description: The url of the podcast's cover in size medium.

tab_infos.Name: picture_big
tab_infos.Description: The url of the podcast's cover in size big.

tab_infos.Name: picture_xl
tab_infos.Description: The url of the podcast's cover in size xl.

tab_infos.Name: position
tab_infos.Description: The position of the podcasts in the charts
